channel.title: Did you notice?
channel.description:
I have noticed some things in the Black Mesa: Source game:
1 - In the cold chamber part, from "Apprehension", the HUD status shows damage from BURNING? 2 - I never have seen a damage by biological hazard. In the "Residue Processing" for example, the green toxic waste tanks are radioactive. I am not sure if in HL1, they are radioactive too.
If I am mistaken, or if the error was correct, disconsider my message. ?(

item.title: Did you notice?
item.dc:creator: R34L0RD
item.description:
I have noticed some things in the Black Mesa: Source game:

1 - In the cold chamber part, from “Apprehension”, the HUD status shows damage from BURNING?
2 - I never have seen a damage by biological hazard. In the “Residue Processing” for example, the green toxic waste tanks are radioactive. I am not sure if in HL1, they are radioactive too.

If I am mistaken, or if the error was correct, disconsider my message. ?(
